wikipedia_page.main:
Patrick Malby Crofton Dodwell (8 January 1908 – 28 December 1988) was an English cricketer. Dodwell's batting and bowling styles are unknown. He was born in the British Raj and died at Redhill, Surrey.
Dodwell played a single first-class match for Rangoon Gymkhana in the 1926/27 season against the touring Marylebone Cricket Club.
